content: moonstone roses are a type of hybrid tea rose that are white with a delicate pink edge on each petal sometimes it takes a jewelers loop to fully examine the worth of a gemstone but this jewel of a hybrid tea flower is soooo big you won t need any help to see the impeccable beauty of its classic show form and pearly colors her many blooms almost look sculpted from fine porcelain the pattern includes step by step color photos in order to save your printer ink do not print pages 7 - 16 pink/silver version lion brand feels like butta a pale grey b pink c dusty pink orange/brown version in pattern cascade yarns anthem a tortoiseshell 43 b gold 21 c burnt orange 39 d peach pink 48 e apricot ice 71
